full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 761 Filed 08/10/22 Page 202 of 246 2497 LCGCmax6 Aznaran - direct
1 been discussing?
2 A. Yes.
3 Q. Are those reports generated in the normal course of CBP's regularly conducted activity?
4 A. Yes.
5 Q. Mr. Aznaran, did there come a time when you were asked to search the TECS system for certain border crossing records related to this case?
6 A. Yes.
7 Q. And were you asked to search for certain travelers?
8 A. Yes.
9 Q. How many travelers were you asked to search for?
10 A. Three.
11 Q. And do you know the names of those travelers without telling me the name?
12 A. I do.
13 Q. So I want to show you first what is admitted under seal as Government Exhibit 12.
14 MR. EVERDELL: With the Court's permission, I'll show it just to the Court and the deputy and the witness. GX12, please, under seal.
15 Q. Mr. Aznaran, do you see that on your screen, that document?
16 A. Yes.
17 Q. That's a document that's already in evidence under seal as Government Exhibit 12. Do you see the name on that document?
18 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
19 DOJ-OGR-00016685
